comprehensive_overview: RISING (Rapidly Installed Systems Engineering) is an open-source systems engineering tool that focuses on automating the system development process. It provides a framework for designing, integrating, and verifying complex systems with an emphasis on modularity, reusability, and maintainability.
core_features: Key features of RISING include system modeling, requirement management, architecture design, simulation and analysis, verification and validation, and documentation generation. It offers a set of tools and libraries to support the entire systems engineering lifecycle.
